name: LaciaOS Hakone
description:
Welcome to Lacia! We are pleased to present you the new version of the Hakone OS.

It was created for 2 months to please you!

Main advantages over previous versions of Lacia:

  • A large number of programs
  • More settings
  • Much more interesting and beautiful
  • More features
  • Created with a soul and love for you.

Did you know?

There are more than 1000 lines of code in this version 

of Lacia, which is a significant number of programs.

A useful keyboard shortcut

Press CTRL+S in notepad and save the text, then just

paste it into any text file by pressing Tab.

Our employees

Our team of 3 people worked hard on the 

project to make it interesting for you.

Our website: https://laciastudio.rf.gd

==Thanks==
